name: Kew Blockout and One Screen Sunscreen Double Roller Blind
shortDescription: The Kew Blockout and One Screen Sunscreen Double Roller Blind offers full privacy at night and filtered outdoor views by day. Ideal for modern interiors, it combines thermal insulation and light control with easy maintenance.
tagLine: 100% custom made in Australia within 7 working days.
longHeadline: Day and Night Light Control with Privacy and Outdoor Views
longDescription:
The Kew Blockout and One Screen Sunscreen Double Roller Blind combines practical function with contemporary style. The Kew Blockout Blind is made from 100 percent polyester and delivers excellent light exclusion and privacy, making it ideal for bedrooms, living rooms and other private areas. It also provides thermal insulation, helping to regulate indoor temperatures for year round comfort.

Paired with the One Screen Sunscreen Blind, made from a 30 percent polyester and 70 percent PVC blend, this system allows daytime visibility while reducing glare and heat. With a fabric weight of 400gsm, thickness of 0.57mm, and an openness factor between 5 to 8 percent, the sunscreen fabric filters sunlight effectively while preserving outdoor views. The 3000mm width supports larger window applications and the system is suited for roller blinds.

Both fabrics meet flame retardant standards under the Building Code of Australia for class 2 to 9 buildings and are easy to clean with a soft cloth or soapy water. The One Screen fabric also complements the One Block range, offering a unified aesthetic. Motorisation options are available for enhanced convenience and effortless control. This double roller solution is perfect for spaces that require adaptable light control throughout the day and night.
careInstructions: Surface dust can be removed with vacuum or a soft cloth.

name: Kew Blockout and Metro Light Filtering Double Roller Blind
shortDescription: The Kew Blockout and Metro Light Filtering Double Roller Blind offers full night-time privacy with soft, filtered daylight ideal for spaces that need flexibility and comfort throughout the day.
tagLine: 100% custom made in Australia within 7 working days.
longHeadline: Balanced Daylight and Night-time Privacy with Dual Fabric Functionality
longDescription:
The Metro Light Filtering Blind gently diffuses sunlight, filling the room with soft natural light while maintaining privacy during the day. It reduces glare without darkening the space, making it ideal for living rooms, dining areas and open-plan spaces.

In the evening or when full privacy is needed, the Kew Blockout Blind can be drawn. Made from 100 percent polyester, it effectively blocks outside light and views, providing insulation and privacy for bedrooms or any private space.

Together, this combination gives you precise control over light and privacy at any time of day. Both fabrics are low maintenance and flame retardant to meet the Building Code of Australia standards for class 2 to 9 buildings. Available in widths up to 3000mm and compatible with both manual and motorised roller systems, this double blind is a practical choice for larger windows and modern interiors. Whether you're filtering daylight or blocking it out completely, the Kew and Metro combination delivers adaptable performance with a clean, contemporary finish.
careInstructions: Surface dust can be removed with vacuum or a soft cloth.

name: Kew Blockout and Serengetti Light Filtering Double Roller Blind
shortDescription: Enjoy flexible light control and privacy with the Kew Blockout and Serengetti Light Filtering Double Roller Blind, a stylish dual-layer solution that combines soft daylight filtering with full blockout coverage when needed.
tagLine: 100% custom made in Australia within 7 working days.
longHeadline: Dual Roller Blind for Daytime Light and Night-time Privacy
longDescription:
The Kew Blockout and Serengetti Light Filtering Double Roller Blind is designed for flexibility, offering an effective balance between natural light and privacy.

The Serengetti Light Filtering fabric allows soft daylight to fill the room while maintaining privacy during the day. It reduces glare without darkening the space, making it ideal for living areas, dining rooms and open-plan environments.

When full privacy or darkness is required, the Kew Blockout Blind can be drawn. Made from 100 percent polyester, it blocks external light and views completely, providing comfort and insulation for bedrooms, media rooms or any private space.

This dual blind system gives you control over lighting and privacy throughout the day. Both fabrics are low maintenance and flame retardant, meeting the Building Code of Australia requirements for class 2 to 9 buildings. Suitable for widths up to 3000mm and compatible with manual or motorised roller systems, it is a practical choice for larger windows and contemporary interiors.

The Kew and Serengetti combination delivers clean lines and reliable performance, ideal for any space needing adaptable window coverage.
careInstructions: Surface dust can be removed with vacuum or a soft cloth.

name: Sanctuary Blockout and Serengetti Light Filtering Double Roller Blind
shortDescription: A dual roller blind system offering soft filtered light by day and complete blockout and insulation by night, combining practicality with a clean, contemporary finish.
tagLine: 100% custom made in Australia within 7 working days.
longHeadline: Complete Light Control with Daytime Filtering and Night-time Blockout
longDescription:
The Sanctuary Blockout and Serengetti Light Filtering Double Roller Blind is designed to give you full control over light and privacy at any time of day.

During daylight hours, the light filtering layer gently diffuses sunlight, reducing glare while maintaining privacy. It allows soft natural light to fill your space, making it ideal for open-plan living, kitchens and shared areas where brightness and comfort are key.

When night falls or full privacy is needed, the blockout layer can be drawn. This high-performance fabric completely blocks external light and views, enhancing insulation and creating a restful environment. Its three-dimensional texture adds a refined finish to any room, while the durable polyester construction ensures long-term performance.

Tested to AS 2663 1999 standards and compliant with the Building Code of Australia for class 2 to 9 buildings, both fabrics are flame retardant and low maintenance. With high solar reflection and minimal light transmittance, the blockout layer supports energy efficiency by reducing heat gain.

Suitable for window widths up to 3000mm and compatible with manual or motorised operation, this dual blind system delivers functional style for modern interiors where adaptable coverage is essential.
careInstructions: Surface dust can be removed with vacuum or a soft cloth.

name: Sanctuary Blockout and Metro Light Filtering Double Roller Blind
shortDescription: A versatile dual roller blind system combining the Sanctuary blockout fabric with the Metro light filtering layer, offering complete light control, privacy and insulation for day and night use.
tagLine: 100% custom made in Australia within 7 working days.
longHeadline: Day to Night Light Control with Thermal Insulation and Privacy
longDescription:
The Sanctuary Blockout and Metro Light Filtering Double Roller Blind offers practical and stylish light management for modern interiors. This dual blind system allows you to adjust your environment throughout the day with ease.

The Metro light filtering layer softly diffuses daylight, reducing glare while maintaining a level of daytime privacy. It fills your space with natural light, making it well suited to living rooms, kitchens and shared spaces where brightness and comfort matter.

As evening sets in or when full privacy is required, the Sanctuary blockout layer can be drawn to eliminate external light and visibility. With its textured finish and thermal performance, this fabric enhances insulation and adds a refined look to your window.

Both fabrics are flame retardant, low maintenance, and meet AS 2663 1999 standards. Suitable for installations up to 3000mm wide and compatible with both manual and motorised operation, this system brings adaptable control and a clean, modern appearance to any setting.
careInstructions: Surface dust can be removed with vacuum or a soft cloth.

longHeadline: Day to Night Light Control with Thermal Insulation and Privacy
longDescription:
The Sanctuary Blockout and Metro Light Filtering Double Roller Blind offers practical and stylish light management for modern interiors. This dual blind system allows you to adjust your environment throughout the day with ease.

The Metro light filtering layer softly diffuses daylight, reducing glare while maintaining a level of daytime privacy. It fills your space with natural light, making it well suited to living rooms, kitchens and shared spaces where brightness and comfort matter.

As evening sets in or when full privacy is required, the Sanctuary blockout layer can be drawn to eliminate external light and visibility. With its textured finish and thermal performance, this fabric enhances insulation and adds a refined look to your window.

Both fabrics are flame retardant, low maintenance, and meet AS 2663 1999 standards. Suitable for installations up to 3000mm wide and compatible with both manual and motorised operation, this system brings adaptable control and a clean, modern appearance to any setting.
careInstructions: Surface dust can be removed with vacuum or a soft cloth.

name: Sanctuary Blockout and One Screen Sunscreen Double Roller Blind
shortDescription: A functional double roller blind system pairing Sanctuary blockout with One Screen sunscreen fabric, providing daytime glare control, outward visibility and full night-time privacy with thermal insulation.

longHeadline: Daytime Glare Reduction with Night-Time Blockout and Thermal Performance
longDescription:
The Sanctuary Blockout and One Screen Sunscreen Double Roller Blind offers flexible light control and energy efficiency across all hours of the day. Designed for spaces that require clear outward views during the day and complete privacy at night, this dual system balances functionality with a streamlined finish.

The One Screen sunscreen layer allows natural light to filter in while significantly reducing glare and solar heat. It preserves your daytime view of the outdoors without compromising on comfort, making it ideal for living areas, kitchens and offices where visibility and light control are key.

Suitable for window widths up to 3000mm and compatible with manual or motorised operation, this system provides a versatile solution for modern living.

name: Linesque Blockout and Serengetti Light Filtering Double Roller Blind
shortDescription: A double roller blind system combining Linesque blockout fabric with Serengetti light filtering, offering total light exclusion at night and softly diffused daylight with privacy during the day.
tagLine: 100% custom made in Australia within 7 working days.
longHeadline: Complete Night-Time Blockout with Daytime Light Filtering and Privacy
longDescription:
The Linesque Blockout and Serengetti Light Filtering Double Roller Blind offers flexible light control, privacy and energy efficiency, making it suitable for both residential and commercial interiors.

The Serengetti light filtering layer allows soft natural light to enter the room while minimising glare and maintaining daytime privacy. Ideal for shared spaces, kitchens and open-plan areas, it reduces harsh sunlight while keeping the atmosphere bright and comfortable.

In the evening or when full light exclusion is needed, the Linesque blockout layer provides total privacy and complete darkness. Made from 100% polyester with an acrylic coating, this fabric features a high-density weave, weighs 431gsm and has a nominal thickness of 0.65mm. It is PVC and lead free, fire tested to AS 1530 Part III, and meets the Building Code of Australia for class 2 to 9(a) buildings. With high light fastness and tear resistance, it delivers long-term performance in demanding environments. Greenguard Gold certification also makes it suitable for sensitive settings such as schools and healthcare facilities.

Both fabrics are low maintenance and flame retardant. Suitable for windows up to 3000mm wide and compatible with manual or motorised operation, this double blind system delivers adaptable coverage with a clean, modern finish.
careInstructions: Surface dust can be removed with vacuum or a soft cloth.

tagLine: 100% custom made in Australia within 7 working days.
longHeadline: Complete Night-Time Blockout with Daytime Light Filtering and Privacy
longDescription:
The Linesque Blockout and Serengetti Light Filtering Double Roller Blind offers flexible light control, privacy and energy efficiency, making it suitable for both residential and commercial interiors.

The Serengetti light filtering layer allows soft natural light to enter the room while minimising glare and maintaining daytime privacy. Ideal for shared spaces, kitchens and open-plan areas, it reduces harsh sunlight while keeping the atmosphere bright and comfortable.

In the evening or when full light exclusion is needed, the Linesque blockout layer provides total privacy and complete darkness. Made from 100% polyester with an acrylic coating, this fabric features a high-density weave, weighs 431gsm and has a nominal thickness of 0.65mm. It is PVC and lead free, fire tested to AS 1530 Part III, and meets the Building Code of Australia for class 2 to 9(a) buildings. With high light fastness and tear resistance, it delivers long-term performance in demanding environments. Greenguard Gold certification also makes it suitable for sensitive settings such as schools and healthcare facilities.

Both fabrics are low maintenance and flame retardant. Suitable for windows up to 3000mm wide and compatible with manual or motorised operation, this double blind system delivers adaptable coverage with a clean, modern finish.
careInstructions: Surface dust can be removed with vacuum or a soft cloth.

name: Linesque Blockout and Metro Light Filtering Double Roller Blind
shortDescription: A dual roller blind system featuring Linesque blockout and Metro light filtering fabrics, offering full light exclusion and privacy at night with softly diffused daylight and glare control during the day.
tagLine: 100% custom made in Australia within 7 working days.
longHeadline: Total Blockout with Daytime Glare Control and Soft Light Diffusion
longDescription:
The Linesque Blockout and Metro Light Filtering Double Roller Blind provides effective light control and privacy throughout the day and night. This practical and versatile system is ideal for modern living spaces, offices and shared areas where adaptable coverage is essential.

The Metro light filtering fabric gently diffuses incoming sunlight, reducing glare while maintaining a level of daytime privacy. It allows natural light to brighten the room without the intensity of direct sun, making it well suited to areas where comfort and visibility are important.

In the evening or when full privacy is required, the Linesque blockout layer delivers complete light exclusion. Constructed from 100% polyester with an acrylic coating, this durable fabric has a substantial weight of 431gsm and a nominal thickness of 0.65mm. It is PVC and lead free, rated for high tear resistance, and features strong light fastness (Blue Scale 6). Compliant with the Building Code of Australia for class 2 to 9(a) buildings and fire tested to AS 1530 Part III, it also holds Greenguard Gold certification, making it suitable for sensitive environments such as schools and healthcare settings.

Both fabrics are flame retardant, easy to clean and designed for long-term use. Suitable for window widths up to 3000mm and compatible with both manual and motorised operation, this dual blind system offers a clean, modern solution for effective light management.
careInstructions: Surface dust can be removed with vacuum or a soft cloth.
